actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-714.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 394 - 1 (Record Vote No: 199).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1158) to amend title VIII of the Act commonly called the Civil Rights Act of 1968, to revise the procedures for the enforcement of fair housing, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1158 (fair housing).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1158) to amend title VIII of the Act commonly called the Civil Rights Act of 1968, to revise the procedures for the enforcement of fair housing, and for other purposes.
